definition[0]: to move your fingers gently over someone’s body in order to make them laugh
definition[1]: if something touching your body tickles you, it makes you want to rub your body because it is slightly uncomfortable
example[2]: Mazie’s fur collar was tickling her neck.
definition[2]: if a situation, remark etc tickles you, it amuses or pleases you
example[3]: The kids were tickled pink to see you on TV!
definition[3]: a feeling in your throat that makes you want to cough
example[4]: I’ve got a tickle in my throat.
